functionalj.function

Interface Func2<INPUT1,INPUT2,OUTPUT>

  • Type Parameters:
    INPUT1 - the first input data type.
    INPUT2 - the second input data type.
    OUTPUT - the output data type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    BiFunction<INPUT1,INPUT2,OUTPUT>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DoubleDoubleFunction<TARGET>, DoubleDoublePredicatePrimitive, DoubleDoubleToDoubleFunctionPrimitive, DoubleObjBiFunction<DATA,TARGET>, DoubleObjBiPredicate<DATA>, IntBiPredicatePrimitive, IntDoubleBiFunction<TARGET>, IntDoublePredicate, IntDoubleToDoubleFunctionPrimitive, IntDoubleToIntFunction, IntDoubleToIntFunctionPrimitive, IntIntBiFunction<TARGET>, IntLongBiFunction<TARGET>, IntLongToIntFunction, IntLongToLongFunctionPrimitive, IntObjBiFunction<DATA,TARGET>, IntObjBiPredicate<DATA>, IntObjToDoubleBiFunction<DATA>, IntObjToIntBiFunction<DATA>, LongLongBiFunction<TARGET>, LongObjBiFunction<DATA,TARGET>, LongObjBiPredicate<DATA>, ObjDoubleBiFunction<DATA,TARGET>, ObjectDoubleToDoubleFunctionPrimitive<DATA>, ObjectDoubleToIntegerFunctionPrimitive<DATA>, ObjectLongToLongFunctionPrimitive<DATA>, ObjectObjectToDoubleFunctionPrimitive<INPUT1,INPUT2>, ObjectObjectToIntegerFunction<INPUT1,INPUT2>, ObjectObjectToIntFunctionPrimitive<INPUT1,INPUT2>, ObjIntBiFunction<DATA,TARGET>, ObjLongBiFunction<DATA,TARGET>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Func2<INPUT1,INPUT2,OUTPUT>
extends BiFunction<INPUT1,INPUT2,OUTPUT>
    Function of two parameters.
    Author:
    NawaMan -- nawa@nawaman.net
